Night of a Million Billion Zombies (N.O.M.B.S)

	
Destroy a million billion zombies as one of five playable characters in this 
third-person beat-'em-up.



	








	

	How to Install:


	STEP 1:		Extract file with 7z to anywhere you like.
			(note: Game will install to 'OS':GamesNOMBS)


	STEP 2:		Double click 'setup.exe' in 'N.O.M.B.S - Night of a 			Million Billion Zombies!!!' folder.


	STEP 3:		Follow on screen instructions!
			*DO NOT INTERRUPT PROCESS ONCE EXTRACTION HAS BEGUN*

	
	STEP 4:		Start game from Desktop. 
		
	
	
					







					N'Joy!








Freeman G Ripper
